entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
